Name: Military
Desc: Character ATK +10% for each Red Area you explore.

Name: Foundations
Desc: Construction Permit +1 for each 3 Blue Areas you explore.

Name: Economy
Desc: Silver Coins +15 for each Yellow Area you explore.

Name: Activate Funds
Desc: Gain 300 Silver Coins and 4 Construction Permits.

Name: Additional Compensation
Desc: File Box +1 for each 6 Contentless Areas you explore.

Name: Proxy Campaign
Desc: Spend Military Development Rate to perform a proxy battle. The effects of the proxy battle will be halved and can only reduce the enemy's HP by 50% at at time if you spend Silver Coins.
